Changelog:
Build 2024.4.20.939
- Added the event "EV_VOLATILE_ADDON_DISABLED" individually per addon. Payload is addon signature.
- Fixed a scenario in which changing the state of some addons would not be saved.- Removed the "Last-Modified" header check for EUpdateProvider::Direct. It was causing more issues than helping. It will be reintroduced at a later date.
- Added addon flag "OnlyLoadDuringGameLaunchSequence" for addons like ArcDPS that can not be loaded later.
- Fixed addons loading anyway when they updated, even if their state was disabled.

Build 2024.4.16.1166
- Fixed ArcDPS Library showing already installed plugins as downloadable.
- Added events for Unofficial Extras.

Build 2024.4.15.1294
- Fixed Addon Library installation breaking in some cases.
- Reworked the entire Loader logic to call Addon::Unload async, to let addons stall.
- Fixed a crash on game close.
- Fixed a crash in DataLink when sharing resources.
- Changed addon ToS warning icon.
- Sort addons by alphabet.

Build 2024.4.11.388
- Added collapsible categories to keybinds.
- Fixed a client crash/freeze when editing keybinds.
- Added button to delete keybinds that are not in use by any addon.

Build 2024.4.9.1072
- Fixed Global Scale.
- Reordered Render draw calls.
- Added ImGui Metrics Debugger to Debug window.

Build 2024.4.9.354
- Fixed Global Scale.

Build 2024.4.8.361
- Fixed Global Scale saving as 0.
